sentences.en: And then, the author researches how to realize the three tier application.
sentences.cn: 第五, 阐述实现三层式应用程序的方法.

sentences.en: Deflection moved to Tier 3. 3 point talent now.
sentences.cn: 偏斜移动到第3层,只有3个等级.

sentences.en: Each tier of cells is earmarked for a particular function.
sentences.cn: 每层细胞都有明确的特殊功能标记.

sentences.en: Heated air is forced into the upper tier of ducts.
sentences.cn: 加热的气流被送入上面的一排管道.

sentences.en: Impale ( Arms ) moved to Tier 3, no longer requires Deep Wounds.
sentences.cn: 天赋穿刺 ( 武器 ) 移动到第三行, 不需要重伤作为前置天赋.

sentences.en: Improved Revenge is now a Tier 3 talent. Up from Tier 2.
sentences.cn: 强化复仇现在从二阶天赋升为三阶天赋.

sentences.en: In the operations tier, HRM operation and appointment are discussed.
sentences.cn: 在运作层面, 论述了人力资源管理运行的组织保障和人员分工.

sentences.en: Survival Instincts moved from Tier 5 to Tier 2.
sentences.cn: 生存本能从第5层移动到第2层.

sentences.en: That leaves you tier 1 anti - infantry defenses and to dispatch the engineer.
sentences.cn: 你可以用一级 反 步兵防御和不病区干掉工程师.
下面一层有一万个座位。

sentences.en: The procedure he created was a two - tier ballot.
sentences.cn: 他倡议的新办法,是两次投票法.

sentences.en: Tier integration is the center of the J 2 EE programming model.
sentences.cn: J2EE编程模式的中心思想是多层集成.

sentences.en: Tier upon tier of trees are growing on the hill.
sentences.cn: 山上各种树木层层叠叠.

sentences.en: Understanding of multi tier and component based business applications.
sentences.cn: 理解基于多层和组件式的商业软件架构.

sentences.en: Units of pressure - tier system, but the use of metric units of measurement.
sentences.cn: 单位中的压力级制相同, 但计量单位采用米制.

sentences.en: We sat in the upper tier at the stadium.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在体育场的上排.

trans.tran_cn: 等级，阶梯座位等的一排，一行，一层，包扎工
trans.tran_en: one of several levels or layers that rise up one above the other
to be or arrange in tiers
